entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Deep River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:33 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Garrison Petawawa 9:33 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -10.8°C
Wind: ESE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening then snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
